long.ar,ca,cs,da,de,es,es_419,fr,id,it,ja,ko,:
Improve Youtube's layout 
and add useful features to Youtube! 

! (This is our BETA TESTING VERSION of: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/improvedtube-for-youtube/bnomihfieiccainjcjblhegjgglakjdd  )

âœ“ Youtube Player Sizes, Quality, Encoding, Framerate, VGA, HD, 4k, 30fps, h264  âœ“ Expand Video Description by default 
âœ“ Schedule better viewing at night     âœ“ Blue-light (Preserve sleepiness)   âœ“ display dim     âœ“ Black / Dark color themes  
âœ“ Hide YouTube Elements, Remove Related Videos, Hover Header, Hide Annotations, Hide Comments 
âœ“ Pop-out Player âœ“ Mini Player (when scrolled down)  
âœ“ Extra Player Buttons (optional)  âœ“ Loop (Repeat) âœ“ Screenshot âœ“ ... 
âœ“ Default Playback Speed âœ“ Default Volume Level 
âœ“ AutoPlay off/on âœ“ Playlist Auto-Play âœ“ "Up Next" Auto Play âœ“ Applies most settings live (without reloading)  *new*   
âœ“ New, easy menu, including touchscreen users.
âœ“ Futureproof, works with the next Youtube already.
âœ“ Force Flash player *old Improvedtube only* (âœ“ Old menu & legacy code remain unlimited.)    
âœ“ And many more features  

With ImprovedTube you can expect all normal YouTube functions and features to work as expected. It runs lightweight and only when you need it. We also care about your privacy. Unlike many other extensions out there.

Notice An Issue?
If you notice any issue, require support, or want a new feature please go to our Support Page. Please do not voice your issues in the Review section until after you try contacting us about the issue. We will work on resolving the issue to make your experience with ImprovedTube a 5/5 star experience.  
bugs@improvedtube.com, ideas@improvedtube.com

â¯ï¸ğŸ”ğŸ”€ Extra Player Buttons (optional): Loop Repeat â• Rotate Video â• Buttons â• Default audio volume Level 
â• Default Playback Speed â• Pip Picture in Picture

ImprovedTube is lightweight ğŸƒ (You can expect all normal YouTube functions to work as expected!) We also don't see you (ğŸ”’ privacy): It only needs permission to access youtube visuals & runs offline (Unlike many extensions out there.) We can't care about what video you watch, just that you have a better time.

â• Video Volume MixerğŸ›ï¸ğŸ”ŠğŸ§ª

Weâ™¥ Youtube Extension Devs & tried many unique/friendly, notably cool, smart features 
â€¢ check https://improvedtube.com (what else is great?)( Compatiblity: you don't need common features (some copy our code)('adblock' 'youtube adblocker' 'dark theme for youtube' 'automatic 4K auto hd popout 'lights off' floating cinema mode, theater mode, looper replay repeater, player speed control 'video speed controller' window expander, magic actions, youtube enhancer - But you CAN just try what you need, i.e.
sponsor skip adblock, besides a YT Extension works with "access youtube.com" / You dont need to accept "alerts "change privacy settings "access all websites "browser history - could be optional opt-in)

â‡’New:
â• Mini Player scrolling 
â• draggable ImprovedTube icon on youtub

â• Channel enable "featured content" (vs channel intro trailer)
â• Mimic retro classic YT Theme Style Layout â• Thumbnail HD .gif : OFF
â• H264 codec (h264ify to speed up Player / save CPU electricity. H.264 encoding is faster, efficient in GPUs designed before 2016 AV1 VP8 VP9 Flash)
â• Pop-out Player ("always-on-top is possible through OS or an app OS)

Improve Youtube's layout and add useful features to Youtube to enjoy your Youtube customized for you from now on.

! (This is our BETA TESTING VERSION of: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/improvedtube-for-youtube/bnomihfieiccainjcjblhegjgglakjdd  )

âœ“ Youtube Player Sizes, Quality, Encoding, Framerate, VGA, HD, 4k, 30fps, h264  âœ“ Expand Video Description by default 
âœ“ Schedule better viewing at night     âœ“ Blue-light (Preserve sleepiness)   âœ“ display dim     âœ“ Black / Dark color themes  
âœ“ Hide YouTube Elements, Remove Related Videos, Hover Header, Hide Annotations, Hide Comments 
âœ“ Pop-out Player âœ“ Mini Player (when scrolled down)  
âœ“ Extra Player Buttons (optional)  âœ“ Loop (Repeat) âœ“ Screenshot âœ“ ... 
âœ“ Default Playback Speed âœ“ Default Volume Level 
âœ“ AutoPlay off/on âœ“ Playlist Auto-Play âœ“ "Up Next" Auto Play âœ“ Applies most settings live (without reloading)  *new*   
âœ“ New, easy menu, including touchscreen users.
âœ“ Futureproof, works with the next Youtube already.
âœ“ Force Flash player *old Improvedtube only* (âœ“ Old menu & legacy code remain unlimited.)    
âœ“ And many more features  

With ImprovedTube you can expect all normal YouTube functions and features to work as expected. It runs lightweight and only when you need it. We also care about your privacy. Unlike many other extensions out there.

Notice An Issue?
If you notice any issue, require support, or want a new feature please go to our Support Page. Please do not voice your issues in the Review section until after you try contacting us about the issue.
